Uses of Package
org.hibernate.search.indexes

  • Packages that use org.hibernate.search.indexes 
    Package Description
    org.hibernate.search  
    org.hibernate.search.elasticsearch.indexes  
    org.hibernate.search.elasticsearch.spi  
    org.hibernate.search.indexes  
    org.hibernate.search.indexes.spi  
    org.hibernate.search.spi  
  • Classes in org.hibernate.search.indexes used by org.hibernate.search 
    Class and Description
    IndexFamily
    An IndexFamily represents a set of indexes using the same indexing technology and the same "global" configuration (e.g.
    IndexFamilyType
    Represents a type of IndexFamily, to be used as a key to retrieve an actual instance of an index family.
    IndexReaderAccessor
    The IndexReaderAccessor exposes IndexReaders directly, making it possible to query the Lucene indexes directly bypassing Hibernate Search.
  • Classes in org.hibernate.search.indexes used by org.hibernate.search.elasticsearch.indexes
